author: Reina Sultan, Amy Rose Spiegel, Rachel Miller
title: 13 Essential Workers Describe What Their Lives Are Like Right Now
description: "Workers consistently ask our bosses to reduce public access, remaining open but preventing customers from aimlessly wandering our aisles and increasing our risk of infection. They refuse."
content: As ordinances to shelter-in-place are announced, millions of Americans are working from home, if not laid off or furloughed. Many others are still going to work every day. Before the COVID-19 pandemic, service workers were on the frontlinesnot of pandemic res… [+25540 chars]
